usage: pytest [-h] [--config CONFIG] [--name NAME]
              [--nonprofit | --no-nonprofit] [--members MEMBERS]
              [--machines MACHINES]

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --config CONFIG       Configuration file(s) to load.
  --name NAME           Name of the organization
  --nonprofit, --no-nonprofit
                        Whether the organization is a nonprofit
  --members MEMBERS     Members of the organization
  --machines MACHINES   Machines the organization owns
